alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 09 at 6:08AM AKST until January 12 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Strong winds, blowing snow with low visibility and freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. Blowing snow could reduce visibilities to one half mile at times. Ice accumulation of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of blowing snow with low visibility are expected to develop Wednesday afternoon and continue into Wednesday night. A mix of snow and freezing rain is possible late Wednesday night into Thursday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
